name: SillySeagull
0:
”Alexa open silly seagull”
”Alexa play silly seagull”
skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: silly seagull
Developer Terms of Use
des:
This skill is a part of Mini Games.

Have you ever wanted to rule the skies as a seagull?

Soar through the skies with the silliest of Seagulls! Keep your seagull aloft by shouting 'eat food', this will restore your energy. If your energy goes to 0, you'll run out of energy and its game over!

Every 3 times you eat, you will need to release the poop shoot, this is so your seagull doesn't explode! Say: 'release' to release the poop shoot.

After every 5 commands, you activate POWER MODE. In power mode, shout 'power' to experience a swift surge through the sky, fully restore your energy, and reset that all-important poop counter.

Challenge yourself to see how far you can fly. Dive in and unleash the silliness!

This skill is supported on all Alexa enabled devices, and has awesome visuals and animations for devices with screens, as well as immersive audio to make you feel like you're soaring the skies!

This skill is part of Mini Games.

If you launch this skill, it will tell you to open Mini Games.

HUGO FM
priv:
